measured_by: Deviation of current Review Polarity Index (RPI) from the user’s mean RPI
justification: “Like vison et. al. 2019, we used deviation of review polarity indexes (RPI as an implicit rating) from mean of RPI for each user as a measure for changes in reviewers views.”
“When we computationally analyze the polarity of emotions with Stanford CoreNLP … we reach five ranked scales that have a neutral, positive, very positive and negative or very negative labels.”
“In Yelp, users rate their involvement with an item or business from one to five stars and by writing review about that.”

measured_by: Review Polarity Index (RPI) derived with Stanford CoreNLP
justification: “We calculated review polarity index (RPI) which stand as implicit rating scale by Stanford CoreNLP tools.”
